autumn.util.data.json

Class Json

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.data.json.Json

  • public class Json
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static utility methods for working with JSON data.

      • set

        public static JsonValue set(JsonValue root,
            java.lang.Iterable<?> path,
            JsonValue value)
        This method sets a node in a JSON data tree.
        Parameters:
        root - is the root of the data tree.
        path - is the path to the node to set.
        value - is the new node.
        Returns:
        the new root.

      • get

        public static JsonValue get(JsonValue root,
            java.lang.Iterable<?> path)
        This method gets a node in a JSON data tree.
        Parameters:
        root - is the root of the data tree.
        path - is the path to the node to set.
        Returns:
        the node at the path; or null, if the no such node exists.

        This method creates a new and empty array.

      • array

        public static JsonArray array(int size)
        This method creates a new array that contains a given number of JSON null values.
        Parameters:
        size - is the number of elements in the new array.
        Returns:
        the new JSON array object.

      • array

        public static JsonArray array(int size,
              JsonValue value)
        This method creates a new array that contains a given number of JSON values.
        Parameters:
        size - is the number of elements in the new array.
        value - is the default value of the initial elements in the new array.
        Returns:
        the new JSON array object.

      • number

        public static JsonNumber number(java.lang.String value)
        This method creates a new numeric value.

        The value must be one of:

        • byte
        • short
        • int
        • long
        • float
        • double
        • BigInteger
        • BigDecimal

        Parameters:
        value - is the number value in textual format.
        Returns:
        the JSON numeric value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the value cannot be parsed.

      • map

        public static JsonMap map()
        This method creates a new map.
        Returns:
        the JSON map.

      • map

        public static JsonMap map(java.util.Map<JsonValue,JsonValue> map)
        This method creates a new map.
        Parameters:
        map - contains the initial entries of the new map.
        Returns:
        the JSON map.
